Centaur.Description: Centaurs from the Feywild combine elven features with the bodies of horses. They resonate with the natural world and are known for their swift, powerful forms.

Option1.Restrictions: You can't raise any of your scores above 20.

Option2.Restrictions: You can't raise any of your scores above 20.

Charge.Description: If you move at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hit it with a melee weapon attack on the same turn, you can immediately follow that attack with a bonus action, making one attack against the target with your hooves.

Equine Build.Description: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push or drag. Climbing that requires hands and feet is especially difficult, costing 4 extra feet of movement per foot climbed.

Hooves.Description: You have hooves that you can use to make unarmed strikes. When you hit with them, the strike deals 1d6 + your Strength modifier bludgeoning damage.

Natural Affinity.Description: You have proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: Animal Handling, Medicine, Nature, or Survival.

Centaur.Languages: Common and one other language chosen with your DM
